price: 15. Kaa kinni baaxó siinih madabah sahhalossemik tet deraafel gexaay kay rizqhi akuma, kaadu ugut kaä fanah yakke Qhiyaamah ayro.
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ ذَلُولٗا فَٱمۡشُواْ فِي مَنَاكِبِهَا وَكُلُواْ مِن رِّزۡقِهِۦۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ ٱلنُّشُورُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī jaʿala lakumu al-arḍa dhalūlan fa-im'shū fī manākibihā wakulū min riz'qihi wa-ilayhi al-nushūru
